reference.title: javaFieldArray
reference.shortdesc: The <javaFieldArray> element specifies within the Data Type declaration that the return value of the field as an array.

refbody.example:
ExampleClick on the following link to open the Java API topic type example in
<javaField id="com.ibm.xtools.ras.impord.engine.tasks.IImportEngineTask"> <apiName>table</apiName> <shortdesc>The two-dimensional array of integers (i.e. the table)</shortdesc> <javaFieldDetail> <javaFieldDef> <javaFieldAccess value="protected"/> <javaFieldPrimitive name="type" value="int"/> <javaFieldArray value="2"/> </javaFieldDef> </javaFieldDetail> </javaField>
<javaField id="com.ibm.xtools.ras.impord.engine.tasks.IImportEngineTask"> <apiName>valueRange</apiName> <shortdesc>The range of values within each column</shortdesc> <javaFieldDetail> <javaFieldDef> <javaFieldAccess value="protected"/> <javaFieldPrimitive name="type" value="int"/> <javaFieldArray value="1"/> </javaFieldDef> </javaFieldDetail> </javaField>
